author: Special Correspondent
text:
The BJP ’s Puducherry unit will soon conduct organisational polls to elect a new president.

Incumbent M.Visweswaran has completed his three-year term. Sources said the election would be conducted before the month end. The party’s local unit claimed to have enrolled 75,000 members during its recent membership drive. On Wednesday, the party elected ‘mandal’ presidents for 30 Assembly constituencies and district presidents.
title: New office-bearers soon for BJP
